channel.title: R3SERVER - Most advanced RSPS so far [GUARANTEED]
channel.description:
[CENTER][size=20pt]I Welcome You to R3SERVER[/size]
[IMG]http://img.youtube.com/vi/jLcupVIknio/0.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Quick video demonstration of the server: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZScWXR9qt1Q]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZScWXR9qt1Q[/URL]
Link to play (No need to sign up, just login with user+pass of your choice and start playing): [url=http://www.r3server.tk]http://www.r3server.tk[/url]
Please post your feedback on this thread and also any bugs you encounter. It is currently in beta stage. Also I am looking for staff so start getting your rep up on the server and I may consider making you admin/mod.
